child.name: hasToWaitForParentService
child.label: Has To Wait For ParentService Signal?

method.name: cwOnProcActAfter
method.script: debugPrintln(stcc.getSysdateForLog() + "[" + this.process.id + "] - Received Notification For ParentService Submitted");

child.name: checkIfParentServiceIsAccepted
child.label: Check If Parent Service Is Accepted

method.name: cwOnProcActBefore
method.script:
this.process.processDocument.parentServiceAccepted = (! stcw.checkIfExistProcessKOInOrchestrationTblForLineItem(this.process.processOrder.id, this.process.processDocument.parentServiceDocId));
debugPrintln(stcc.getSysdateForLog() + "[" + this.process.id + "] - parentServiceAccepted = " + this.process.processDocument.parentServiceAccepted);

method.name: cwOnProcActCond

child.name: hasToSkipSendLineItemToGranite
child.label: Has To Skip Send LineItem To Granite?

method.name: cwOnProcActBefore
method.script: this.process.processDocument.acceptedByGranite = true;

method.name: cwOnProcActCond
method.script: return this.process.processOrderItem.alreadySentToGranite;

method.script: this.process.processDocument.rollbackNumber = "1";

cwOnProcActBefore
method.script: this.process.processDocument.rollbackNumber = "3";

method.name: cwOnProcActBefore
method.script: this.process.processDocument.firstPassOrderAck = "Y";

method.name: cwOnProcActBefore
cwOnProcActCond
cwOnProcActBefore
method.script: debugPrintln(stcc.getSysdateForLog() + "[" + this.process.id + "] - Continue with Normal workflow for: " + this.process.processOrderItem.id);

method.name: cwOnProcActCond

method.script: var rb = this.process.processDocument.rollbackNumber; return rb;
